title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Code Llama and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you plug any Ollama-hosted model into chains, agents, retrieval pipelines, and more.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat interface, model management, multi-user support, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list models with fluent builders and reactive streams.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go—browse models, chat, switch contexts, keyboard-driven.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, autoscaling, and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for private Q&A.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside buffers—send selection, get completions, manage prompts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration exposing Ollama models as generators and embedders for end-to-end NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized with one-liner.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC service wrapper around Ollama REST API for high-performance streaming in polyglot micro-services.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an Ollama Java client bean for rapid enterprise integration.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting chat, completion, embeddings, and model management with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with tokio-based async and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any server via slash commands and thread-based chats.

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv extension that automatically downloads and spins up the right Ollama model when you enter a project folder.

title: reddit/r/ollama – weekly model discussion
summary: Community roundup where users share new GGUF conversions, benchmarks, and tips for running models efficiently.
